tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE plants (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    plant_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    plant_type TEXT NOT NULL,
    growth_stage INT NOT NULL,
    health_status TEXT,
    plant_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE plants (
   plant_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   plant_name TEXT NOT NULL,
   growth_stage TEXT,
   health_status TEXT,
   plant_type TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE farm_crops (
   crop_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
   crop_name TEXT NOT NULL,
   plant_id INT REFERENCES plants(plant_id),
   planting_date DATE,
   harvest_date DATE,
   growth_status TEXT,
   health_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE crops (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    crop_name TEXT NOT NULL,
    planting_date DATE,
    harvest_date DATE,
    yield_amount INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE Plants (
  plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  plant_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  planted_date DATE,
  health_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Crops (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  crop_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  planting_season VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  estimated_harvest_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE GrowthData (
  growth_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  measurement_date DATE,
  height DECIMAL(5,2),
  width DECIMAL(5,2),
  notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES Plants(plant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  notes TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (plant_id) REFERENCES Plants(plant_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Plants (
  plant_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_name VARCHAR(50),
  plant_type VARCHAR(50),
  planting_date DATE,
  growth_status VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE Crops (
  crop_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_name VARCHAR(50),
  crop_type VARCHAR(50),
  planting_date DATE,
  harvest_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Plant_Growth (
  growth_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  growth_date DATE,
  growth_stage VARCHAR(50),
  growth_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Harvest (
  harvest_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  crop_id INT,
  harvest_date DATE,
  harvested_quantity INT,
  harvest_notes TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Plant_Health (
  health_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  plant_id INT,
  health_date DATE,
  health_status VARCHAR(50),
  health_notes TEXT
);
